name: Llama Launch
description:
Shooting llamas from a cannon has never been this easy or fun!!!!
Choose from one of over twenty different unlockable llamas to load into your cannon, set the power then angle and click LAUNCH to send your llama into orbit!
Collect points along the way by going through hoops or crashing into birds.
There may even be a UFO or two out there if you get high enough!
If you're loosing altitude or speed you can receive a little boost if you have any llama jumps saved up.
